channel.title: Create a .dat file
channel.description:
I have the datmaker downloaded, my custom cape from metasequoia is imported to it, I have selected amulet for animation like I'm supposed to.
Now what else do i need, whenever i try to load the .dat file. I get an error or the cape dosn't load and its a blank screen.
Any help?
Thanks!

item.title: Create a .dat file
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Monkey wacko, post:1, topic:292707”]I have the datmaker downloaded,
my custom cape from metasequoia is imported to it,
I have selected amulet for animation like I’m supposed to.

Now what else do i need, whenever i try to load the .dat file.
I get an error or the cape dosn’t load and its a blank screen.

Any help?

Thanks![/quote]
Try Gzipping it. Also, make sure it has 1500 faces or less. Ontop of these, if it is a 508+ model getting packed into a 317 it will need some conversions before it will work. If you still have problems email me at my aol. I will help you from there.

Read full topic
